Interactions between Antipsychotics,

Trazadone, and Birth Control

Overview of Antipsychotic-Trazadone Interactions

The combination of trazodone with antipsychotic medications can increase the

risk of adverse effects such as dizziness, drowsiness, and changes in blood

pressure. (1)
